column1: #Text=Aang says : " Good to see you , boy .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , you know I try .
#Text=" Zhang leader says : " Let us travel to the Earth Kingdom capital as one tribe .
#Text=" Canyon guide says : " I 'm going too !
#Text=" Sokka says : " That 's some luck you knew Jin Wei and Wei Jin .
#Text=" Aang says : " You could call it luck .
#Text=" Aang says : " I made the whole thing up .
#Text=" Aang says : " Now where is that custard tart ?

#Text=" Main Aang Appa Canyon guide Gan Jins Gan Jin leader Gan Jin tribesman Katara Momo Sokka Zhangs Zhang leader Antagonists Canyon crawlers says : " Minor Jin Wei ( flashback only ) Wei Jin ( flashback only ) "
